name: Classic Brioche French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon. Dip brioche slices in the mixture. Cook in a buttered skillet until golden brown on both sides.

name: Nutella-Stuffed French Toast
instructions: Spread Nutella between two slices of bread to make a sandwich. Dip the sandwich in an egg and milk mixture. Pan-fry until golden.

name: Savory Parmesan Herb French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, Parmesan, and herbs. Dip sourdough slices and pan-fry in olive oil until crispy and golden.

name: Cinnamon Roll French Toast
instructions: Create a cinnamon-sugar swirl in the egg batter. Dip bread and cook until golden. Drizzle with cream cheese icing.

name: Challah French Toast with Berries
instructions: Soak challah bread in a rich egg and cream mixture. Pan-fry until golden and serve topped with fresh mixed berries.

name: Vegan French Toast
instructions: Create a batter with almond milk, nutritional yeast, syrup, and cinnamon. Dip bread and fry in coconut oil.

name: Overnight Baked French Toast Casserole
instructions: Arrange bread cubes in a baking dish. Pour egg mixture over and refrigerate overnight. Bake until golden and set.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake Stuffed French Toast
instructions: Mix cream cheese and strawberries. Spread between bread slices. Dip in egg mixture and pan-fry until golden.

name: Savory Monte Cristo French Toast
instructions: Make a ham and cheese sandwich. Dip it in a savory egg batter and fry until the cheese is melted and the bread is golden.

name: Coconut Cream Pie French Toast
ingredients: Whipped cream and toasted coconut for topping
instructions: Use coconut milk in the batter and coat the bread with shredded coconut before frying. Top with whipped cream.

name: Apple Crumble French Toast
instructions: Sauté apples with brown sugar. Top French toast with cooked apples and a crunchy oat crumble.

name: French Toast Sticks
instructions: Cut bread into sticks. Dip in cinnamon-egg batter and cook on all sides until golden. Serve with maple syrup.

name: Banana Bread French Toast
ingredients: Walnuts and sliced bananas for topping
instructions: Use slices of day-old banana bread. Dip briefly in a simple egg wash and pan-fry until warm and slightly crispy.

name: Savory Mushroom and Spinach French Toast
instructions: Make a savory French toast and top with sautéed mushrooms, spinach, and a sprinkle of feta cheese.

name: Orange Cardamom French Toast
instructions: Add orange zest and cardamom to the egg batter for a fragrant twist. Serve with a drizzle of honey.

name: S'mores French Toast
instructions: Stuff French toast with chocolate and marshmallows. Coat with crushed graham crackers before frying.

name: Pumpkin Spice French Toast
instructions: Whisk pumpkin puree and spice into the egg batter. Cook as usual and serve with maple syrup.

name: Lemon Ricotta Stuffed French Toast
instructions: Mix ricotta and lemon zest for the filling. Stuff between challah slices, dip in egg mix, and pan-fry. Serve with blueberry sauce.

name: Croissant French Toast
instructions: Use day-old croissants. Dip briefly in egg mixture and pan-fry until golden. Dust with powdered sugar.

name: Hong Kong-Style French Toast
instructions: Make a peanut butter sandwich, dip in egg, and deep-fry until golden. Serve with a slice of butter and condensed milk.

name: Coffee-Infused French Toast
instructions: Add chilled coffee and cream to the egg batter. Cook and serve with a drizzle of chocolate sauce.

name: Almond-Crusted French Toast
instructions: Add almond extract to the batter. Press sliced almonds onto the bread before frying for a crunchy crust.

name: Savory Caprese French Toast
instructions: Prepare a savory French toast. Top with fresh mozzarella, halved cherry tomatoes, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

name: Gingerbread French Toast
instructions: Add molasses and gingerbread spices to the egg batter for a festive flavor. Serve with whipped cream.

name: Peanut Butter & Banana French Toast
instructions: Make peanut butter and banana sandwiches. Dip in egg batter and pan-fry until golden. Drizzle with honey.

name: Matcha Green Tea French Toast
instructions: Whisk matcha powder into the egg batter. Serve the French toast with a side of sweet red bean paste.

name: Cornflake-Crusted French Toast
instructions: After dipping in egg, coat the bread with crushed cornflakes for an extra crunchy texture before frying.

name: Savory Avocado and Egg French Toast
instructions: Make savory French toast. Top with mashed avocado, a fried egg, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.

name: Caramel Apple Stuffed French Toast
instructions: Stuff bread with cooked apples and caramel sauce. Dip in a cinnamon-egg batter and fry.

name: Irish Cream French Toast
instructions: Add Irish cream liqueur to the batter for a boozy kick. Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate.

name: Pain Perdu (New Orleans French Toast)
instructions: Soak stale French bread slices in a rich, sweet custard. Pan-fry until deeply golden and caramelized. Dust with powdered sugar.

name: Mascarpone and Fig French Toast
instructions: Make a classic French toast and top with dollops of mascarpone, fresh fig slices, and a drizzle of honey.

name: Hawaiian Roll French Toast
instructions: Use sweet Hawaiian rolls for a fluffy, sweet base. Top with pineapple and toasted coconut.

name: Savory Bacon and Cheddar French Toast
instructions: Mix crumbled bacon and cheddar into the savory egg batter. Cook until the cheese is melted and crispy.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Stuffed French Toast
instructions: Stuff French toast with edible cookie dough. Pan-fry and serve warm with a drizzle of chocolate syrup.

name: Maple Pecan Baked French Toast
instructions: An overnight casserole with a rich maple custard, topped with buttery pecans before baking.

name: Red Velvet French Toast
instructions: Create a red velvet batter with cocoa and red food coloring. Serve with a sweet cream cheese glaze.

name: Everything Bagel French Toast
instructions: Use everything bagels for a savory twist. Dip in egg and pan-fry. Serve with cream cheese and smoked salmon.

name: Tiramisu French Toast
instructions: Soak bread in a coffee-egg mixture. Serve topped with mascarpone and a dusting of cocoa powder.

name: Churro French Toast Sticks
instructions: Make French toast sticks, then immediately roll them in a cinnamon-sugar mixture. Serve with chocolate sauce.

name: Vegan Banana French Toast
instructions: Use mashed banana as the egg substitute in your batter. Fry until golden and serve with syrup.

name: Peaches and Cream French Toast
instructions: Sauté peaches with brown sugar. Make a classic French toast and top with the warm peaches and a drizzle of cream.

name: Sourdough French Toast with Berry Compote
instructions: Use sourdough for a slightly tangy base. Simmer berries and sugar to make a simple compote. Serve toast with compote and yogurt.
